_description: Life’s brevity — one couplet translating ‘Breues dies homis sunt numerus mensium, etc.’ (Job 14.5) written to the right of the Latin in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Sort arn mennis dayȝes his monis ben told alsoHis termis ben
                    iseetȝ þat he ne may ouergo
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 23.
